database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database is the class that holds responsibility for every table that exists in a database.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Paris Mpampaniotis, Theodosis Tsaklanos

      Adds a Table object to the ArrayList that stores every Table object.

      static Database getDatabaseInstance()
      Having more than one Database objects is prevented and therefore the unique object that exists needs to be returned in this way

    • Method Detail

      • getDatabaseInstance

        public static Database getDatabaseInstance()
        Having more than one Database objects is prevented and therefore the unique object that exists needs to be returned in this way
        Returns:
        a database object

      • addTable

        public void addTable(Table table)
        Adds a Table object to the ArrayList that stores every Table object.
        Parameters:
        table -

      • removeTable

        public void removeTable(int index)
        Removes a specific Table object from the ArrayList that stores the tables.
        Parameters:
        index -

      • getTables

        public java.util.ArrayList<Table> getTables()
        Returns:
        an ArrayList that contains Table type objects each of which corresponds to a table that exists in the current database.

      • getTable

        public Table getTable(int x)

      • checkForDuplicateTables

        public boolean checkForDuplicateTables(java.lang.String tableName)
        Parameters:
        tableName -
        Returns:
        true in case the given table name does not exist in the database or false in case the given table name already exists and thus cannot be duplicated.

      • isThereAnyTable

        public boolean isThereAnyTable()
        Returns:
        true if there exists one or more tables in the database.

      • numberOfTables

        public int numberOfTables()
        Returns:
        the size of the ArrayList that stores the Table objects.
